EmailTemplate.subject: International Day Menu - Wednesday, 24th October 2012
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
This is a gentle reminder to submit the International Day menu by today please. This will allow us time to prepare and sort out everything by tomorrow to be ready for Wednesday, 24th October 2012.
If you have already submitted the menu, please ignore this email.
https://eu1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpnjJeSPkQgxfiGFNgxOi1Xky7nu_s=
Thank you.
Kind Regards,
Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education __________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona -Marbella
